General.Name: Murphy&Spitz Green Capital Aktiengesellschaft
General.Description: Murphy & Spitz Green Capital Aktiengesellschaft, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an independent asset management company. It offers sustainable investment strategies and investments for private and institutional clients. The company acquires, develops, and operates solar and wind energy power plants in Germany and Europe. It also develops and manages residential and commercial buildings. Murphy & Spitz Green Capital Aktiengesellschaft is based in Bonn, Germany.
